body.name: Maliton Toiletry Bag for Men & Women | Large for Traveling | Hanging Compact Hygiene Bag with 4 Compartments | Waterproof Bathroom Shower Bag (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 21 mins
features: Compact Design With Large Capacity - 11.2"L x 4.87"W x 7.6"H with 6.4Ounces, Maliton upgraded large travel bag gives you enough space to pack all vacation accessories in one bag; This expandable case can hold 8 x 360ml bottle water with zipper closed and still slim enough to pack into your carry on travel case

Multifuction And Hang For Easy Access - Our waterproof travel bathroom bag will not be more unpacked and mess up your countertop; Utilize the zip around design and the attached hanging hook to hang the shower bag on bathroom door, shower rod or towel rack for fast access to your hygiene products

Multiple Compartments Organizer - Maliton travel organizer bag with the 4 different compartments: the ventilated pocket, elastic loop pocket, mesh pocket and clear plastic pocket to keep everything organized; Wet items can be held in the transparent see through pocket to keep other pockets dry

Durable Material With Double Zipper - Travel organizer toiletries are made of the advanced leakproof Nylon can prevent liquid from leaking through the bag; Reinforced zipper is used to ensure durability and smooth opening; Rest assured knowing that all your bottles are in upright position and secure
Easy-Grab Handle - You can take the toiletry bag anywhere with the portable and convenient grab handle; Great for overnight staying, a long journey, gym shower and outdoor activities

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Maliton Hanging Toiletry Bag Designed with 2 toiletryis organizer, dry and wet seperation pocket and travel sample organizer, Maliton hanging toiletry bag fits for your 1/2 week trips or short trip, camping trip. Travel Sample Organizer: Store travel size cosmetic sample Short Mesh Pocket: Organize small 100ML bottles or makeup tools Mesh Pocket with Elastic Straps: Keep 500ml flat bottle/250 round bottle or place 2 full-size shampoo flat in this organizer Dry and Wet Seperation Organizer: Store your wet towel or other wet items
Hanging Toiletry Bag Makeup Brush Holder Color Black Khaki Waterproof ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great product! A lot of room to put toiletries and a nice bag all around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like the product/great customer service.
reviews.reviewText: I really like this bag overall; good storage space, size, clip to hang excellent price.One of the small zippers broke past the exchange window, and I did receive great customer service. I saw some other people experienced this.I did research and, with a pair of scissors, you can cut into the fabric to reattach the zipper, then sew it back up. So it isn't the end of the world.All in all, I do recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: You can fit a lot into this bag like other reviewers said. I am just not sure how long the zippers will last. I think if you try to fill this to the brim and close it, you will have issues quickly. We will see how it holds up. I like the waterproof pocket and the little pockets with elastic straps to hold items in. I don't like the outside strap. I don't have a big hand, but it's too small. The purple is slightly lighter than the photo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Spent a lot of time reviewing bags and decided to go with this one. Glad I did. Bag can hold a lot of stuff, it is easy to organize everything and takes up minimal space when closed.This bag has been on multiple trips throughout Europe and the US with me and I have had zero issues with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for short and long trips
reviews.reviewText: Great toiletry bag for both short and longer travel. Lots of pockets and zippers to bring everything you need. Thank you for a great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does the job.
reviews.reviewText: My wife has a durable travel bag for both of our products that we have been using for years. When I travel solo (6-8 times a year) this is a solid organizer. May not be as solid as our other kit, but this fits my needs nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice. Simple and neat.
reviews.reviewText: I haven't used it yet but I know it'll be perfect. Waterproof material and very sturdy. Also very nice size. Not too big and not too small.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good Bag With One Slight Suggestion!
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the pleasure of using the Maliton Toiletry Bag for Men & Women during my travels. This large toiletry bag not only offers ample space for all your essentials but also boasts a stylish design that suits both men and women.As someone who carries an extensive array of toiletries, I was thrilled with the bag's spacious interior. There's enough room to fit all my essentials, to skin care products and grooming tools. The thoughtful organization with multiple compartments and pockets made it easy to keep everything neatly arranged and easily accessible.My only gripe with this toiletry bag is that, when filled to capacity, it doesn't zip completely closed. it might be a concern for some users.In that regard, I believe adding an extender zip would be a valuable improvement. This would allow the bag to accommodate even more items without compromising its ability to close securely. I hope Maliton considers this suggestion in future iterations of their product.
There is lots of room in the pockets and the dividers in one section are nice, too. Love the dark olive colour. It is durable and easy to c!ean. It has a hook to hang it up which is very helpful.
Compré el azul brillante y fue un lindo tono. Los materiales se sienten de buena calidad.
Útil para colgar en la regadera en el gimnasio! Tiene suficiente capacidad para todos los artículos del baño y después del baño. Es exactamente a lo que se publica.

reviews.reviewTitle: Hice una buena compra con esta bolsa
reviews.reviewText: Fue una bolsa muy eficiente y amplia. ME ENCANTO;)
